argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nvmval.1 | |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 2 |  | nvmval.2 | |- G = ( +v ` U ) |
| 3 |  | nvmval.4 | |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) |
| 4 |  | nvmval.3 | |- M = ( -v ` U ) |
| 5 | 2 | #P_nvgrp | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> G e. GrpOp ) |
| 6 | 1, 2 | #P_bafval | |- X = ran G |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( inv ` G ) = ( inv ` G ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( /g ` G ) = ( /g ` G ) |
| 9 | 6, 7, 8 | #P_grpodivval | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A ( /g ` G ) B ) = ( A G ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) ) ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A ( /g ` G ) B ) = ( A G ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 4, 8 | #P_nvm | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A M B ) = ( A ( /g ` G ) B ) ) |
| 12 | 1, 2, 3, 7 | #P_nvinv | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ B e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S B ) = ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S B ) = ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A G ( -u 1 S B ) ) = ( A G ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) ) ) |
| 15 | 10, 11, 14 | #P_3eqtr4d | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A M B ) = ( A G ( -u 1 S B ) ) ) |
